projects.title: Battery Notifier
projects.description:
Battery Notifier is a lightweight Flutter application that reminds you to charge or unplug your device based on configurable battery thresholds.

Purpose:
1. Notify the user to charge when the battery falls below a configured minimum and the device is not charging.
2. Notify the user to unplug when the battery rises above a configured maximum and the device is still plugged in.

projects.title: Glove Remote Controller
projects.description: Glove Remote Controller is a Flutter application that allows users to control their devices using a smart glove. The app communicates with the glove via Bluetooth and provides a user-friendly interface for configuring and managing glove settings.
